original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses, ‘Go to see Pharaoh. I have caused his mind to become hard. I have also caused his officers' minds to become hard. I have done this so that I can do miracles to show him my power.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 바로에게로 들어가라 내가 그의 마음과 그의 신하들의 마음을 완강하게 함은 나의 표징을 그들 중에 보이기 위함이며

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses
I have caused his mind to become hard
I have also caused his officers' minds to become hard
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 그 신하들의 마음도 완악하게 만들었다

sentences.original_text: I have done this so that
I can do miracles to show him my power
sentences.korean_translation: 내게 능력을 보이기 위해 기적을 행하기 위함이다
